title: Google\Cloud\Storage\StorageObject
name: StorageObject
description: Objects are the individual pieces of data that you store in Google Cloud Storage.

params.name: connection
params.description: Represents a connection to Cloud Storage.

params.name: name
params.description: The object's name.

params.name: bucket
params.description: The name of the bucket the object is contained in.

params.name: generation
params.description: The generation of the object.

params.name: info
params.description: The object's metadata.

params.name: encryptionKey
params.description: An AES-256 customer-supplied encryption key.

params.name: encryptionKeySHA256
params.description: The SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied encryption key.

methods.name: exists
methods.description: Check whether or not the object exists.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update the object. Upon receiving a result the local object's data will be updated.

examples.caption: Add custom metadata to an existing object.

params.name: metadata
params.description: The available options for metadata are outlined at the JSON API docs

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.predefinedAcl
params.description: Predefined ACL to apply to the object. Acceptable values include, "authenticatedRead", "bucketOwnerFullControl", "bucketOwnerRead", "private", "projectPrivate", and "publicRead".

params.name: options.projection
params.description: Determines which properties to return. May be either 'full' or 'noAcl'.

params.name: options.fields
params.description: Selector which will cause the response to only return the specified fields.

methods.name: copy
methods.description:
Copy the object to a destination bucket.

Please note that if the destination bucket is the same as the source bucket and a new name is not provided the source object will be replaced with the copy of itself.

examples.caption: Provide your destination bucket as a string and retain the source object's name.
Provide your destination bucket as a bucket object and choose a new name for the copied object.

params.name: destination
params.description: The destination bucket.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.name
params.description: The name of the destination object. Defaults to the name of the source object.

params.name: options.predefinedAcl
params.description: Predefined ACL to apply to the object. Acceptable values include, "authenticatedRead", "bucketOwnerFullControl", "bucketOwnerRead", "private", "projectPrivate", and "publicRead".

params.name: options.encryptionKey
params.description: A base64 encoded AES-256 customer-supplied encryption key. It will be neccesary to provide this when a key was used during the object's creation.

params.name: options.encryptionKeySHA256
params.description: Base64 encoded SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied encryption key. This value will be calculated from the encryptionKey on your behalf if not provided, but for best performance it is recommended to pass in a cached version of the already calculated SHA.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

methods.name: rewrite
methods.description:
Rewrite the object to a destination bucket.

This method copies data using multiple requests so large objects can be copied with a normal length timeout per request rather than one very long timeout for a single request.

Please note that if the destination bucket is the same as the source bucket and a new name is not provided the source object will be replaced with the copy of itself.

examples.caption: Provide your destination bucket as a string and retain the source object's name.
Provide your destination bucket as a bucket object and choose a new name for the copied object.
Rotate customer-supplied encryption keys.

params.name: destination
params.description: The destination bucket.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.name
params.description: The name of the destination object. Defaults to the name of the source object.

params.name: options.predefinedAcl
params.description: Predefined ACL to apply to the object. Acceptable values include, "authenticatedRead", "bucketOwnerFullControl", "bucketOwnerRead", "private", "projectPrivate", and "publicRead".

params.name: options.maxBytesRewrittenPerCall
params.description: The maximum number of bytes that will be rewritten per rewrite request. Most callers shouldn't need to specify this parameter - it is primarily in place to support testing. If specified the value must be an integral multiple of 1 MiB (1048576). Also, this only applies to requests where the source and destination span locations and/or storage classes.

params.name: options.encryptionKey
params.description: A base64 encoded AES-256 customer-supplied encryption key. It will be neccesary to provide this when a key was used during the object's creation.

params.name: options.encryptionKeySHA256
params.description: Base64 encoded SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied encryption key. This value will be calculated from the encryptionKey on your behalf if not provided, but for best performance it is recommended to pass in a cached version of the already calculated SHA.

params.name: options.destinationEncryptionKey
params.description: A base64 encoded AES-256 customer-supplied encryption key that will be used to encrypt the rewritten object.

params.name: options.destinationEncryptionKeySHA256
params.description: Base64 encoded SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied destination encryption key. This value will be calculated from the destinationEncryptionKey on your behalf if not provided, but for best performance it is recommended to pass in a cached version of the already calculated SHA.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

methods.name: rename
methods.description:
Renames the object.

Please note that there is no atomic rename provided by the Storage API. This method is for convenience and is a set of sequential calls to copy and delete. Upon success the source object's metadata will be cleared, please use the returned object instead.

params.name: name
params.description: The new name.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.predefinedAcl
params.description: Predefined ACL to apply to the object. Acceptable values include, "authenticatedRead", "bucketOwnerFullControl", "bucketOwnerRead", "private", "projectPrivate", and "publicRead".

params.name: options.encryptionKey
params.description: A base64 encoded AES-256 customer-supplied encryption key. It will be neccesary to provide this when a key was used during the object's creation.

params.name: options.encryptionKeySHA256
params.description: Base64 encoded SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied encryption key. This value will be calculated from the encryptionKey on your behalf if not provided, but for best performance it is recommended to pass in a cached version of the already calculated SHA.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch

params.name: options.ifSourceGenerationNotMatch

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.destinationBucket
params.description: Will move to this bucket if set. If not set, will default to the same bucket.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.encryptionKey
params.description: An AES-256 customer-supplied encryption key. It will be neccesary to provide this when a key was used during the object's creation. If provided one must also include an encryptionKeySHA256.

params.name: options.encryptionKeySHA256
params.description: The SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied encryption key. It will be neccesary to provide this when a key was used during the object's creation. If provided one must also include an encryptionKey.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Retrieves the object's details. If no object data is cached a network request will be made to retrieve it.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.encryptionKey
params.description: An AES-256 customer-supplied encryption key. It will be neccesary to provide this when a key was used during the object's creation in order to retrieve the MD5 hash and CRC32C checksum. If provided one must also include an encryptionKeySHA256.

params.name: options.encryptionKeySHA256
params.description: The SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied encryption key. It will be neccesary to provide this when a key was used during the object's creation in order to retrieve the MD5 hash and CRC32C checksum. If provided one must also include an encryptionKey.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.projection
params.description: Determines which properties to return. May be either 'full' or 'noAcl'.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Triggers a network request to reload the object's details.

params.name: options.encryptionKeySHA256
params.description: Base64 encoded SHA256 hash of the customer-supplied encryption key. This value will be calculated from the encryptionKey on your behalf if not provided, but for best performance it is recommended to pass in a cached version of the already calculated SHA.

params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation matches the given value.

methods.name: gcsUri
methods.description: Formats the object as a string in the following format: gs://{bucket-name}/{object-name}.
